instruction: Can you provide a brief summary of the implications of sovereign green bonds becoming a larger part of green-bond indexes?
output: Sure, as more sovereign green bonds are included in green-bond indexes, investors should take note of the potential difference in risk profile when compared to other green bonds. Additionally, it's important to understand that sovereigns may have a significant influence on the performance of green-bond indexes, as they have the ability to issue and allocate more bonds towards green projects.
